description: Learn how to achieve the rich and full-bodied flavour of ragu in only 30 minutes with this easy pasta recipe. This pork and fennel ragu is the ultimate comfort food.
name: Simple Pork & Fennel Ragu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 La Molisana Pastificio Extra Di Lusso egg tagliatelle no 203

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add sausage mince, then cook, breaking up mince with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until browned. Using a slotted spoon, transfer mince to a plate, reserving oil in pan.

Add onion and cook for 2 minutes or until softened. Return mince to pan, and add wine and stock. Simmer for 3 minutes or until slightly thickened. Add tomatoes and cook, uncovered, for 15 minutes or until slightly thickened. Season.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Add pasta, parmesan, half the parsley and reserved cooking liquid to pan. Toss to combine. Serve ragu sprinkled with remaining parsley and extra parmesan.
